item.description:
Get your plant-based groove on with us at this special celebration!

Bring a dish to share and serving spoon, plus your own plate, utensils and beverage of choice.

We'll label everything as some people have food sensitivities (gluten, soy, etc). All food must be free of meat, dairy, genetically modified organisms and any animal products.

This is a great gathering for vegans, vegetarians, or anyone who enjoys eating plants. Come hungry and enjoy the company of friends old and new.

FREE PARKING! In the back of the ArtSpace building. Ignore "Resident Parking Only" signs. Parking is allowed during this event. Enter through the back entrance by the murals.

This event is organized by Amy LaBossiere, Partner and Executive Director of Holistic Health for Still Waters retreat center and holistic health counselor to individuals and groups. (http://innerlighthhc.com)
item.name: Organic Vegan Potluck Dinner
